paper_title.en: Structural property and activity for methane oxidation of iron oxides prepared by NaOH and FeSO4 solution

description.en: iron oxides were prepared by air oxidation of suspension obtained by mixing solutions of NaOH and FeSO4.7H(2)O. The ratio R was defined by mixing molar ratio of cations in the respective solutions (Na/Fe). Goethite (alpha-FeOOH) was mainly obtained in the range of R less than or equal to 1.9 (acidic region) and R greater than or equal to 2.6 (basic region). Methane oxidation over the iron oxides started at as low temperature as 300degreesC, at which the goethite changed to a hematite (alpha-Fe2O3). The conversion ratio was low by the acidic goethite, in spite of its low crystallinity and high specific surface area. The basic goethite showed high activity for methane oxidation and the activity decreased gradually with increasing R. The low activity by the acidic goethite is attributable to the existence of some more percents of residual sulfate ion. And the sulfate ions disturbed the arrangement of oxide ions in the crystal structure of hematite.

publisher.en: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD

publication_name.en: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF MODERN PHYSICS B

paper_title.en: Annealing effects on transparent conducting properties of amorphous ZnO-In2O3 films

description.en: Structural and transparent conducting properties of amorphous Zn-In-O films deposited by simultaneous sputtering of ZnO and In2O3 targets facing each other were reviewed. Post-annealing under the reductive gas flow was effective on improving unevenness of the amorphous films.

publisher.en: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD

publication_name.en: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF MODERN PHYSICS B

Detection of target DNA by electrochemical method

description.en: The interaction of the osmium complexes {[Os(bpy)(3)](3+) (bpy = bipyridine), [Os(phen)(3)](2+) (phen = 1,10-phenanthroline), [Os(5,6-dmphen)(3)](2+) (5,6-dmphen = 5,6-dimethyl-1, 10-phenanthroline), and [Os(4,7-dmphen)(3)](2+) (4,7-dmphen = 4,7-dimethyl- 1,10-phenanthroline)} with calf thymus DNA were studied electrochemically. The binding constant of [Os(5,6-dmphen)(3)](2+), K = 4.2 x 10(5) M-1 was found to be larger than those observed for the known metal complex indicator and osmium complexes with methyl phenanthroline ligands. This paper shows that a DNA sensor system with [Os(5,6-dmphen)(3)](2+) as a hybridization indicator and square wave voltammetry, could selectively detect DNA in a range of 6.9 x 10(-10) to 6.9 x 10(-5) g/ml. (C) 2001 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.
